thread.title: Dead Rising 4 shuffles onto Steam in March
thread.title_full: Dead Rising 4 shuffles onto Steam in March

title: Dead Rising 4 shuffles onto Steam in March
text:
Dead Rising 4 shuffles onto Steam in March No brainer. By Wesley Yin-Poole   
Dead Rising 4 comes out on Steam on 14th March, Capcom has announced. 
The zombie kill 'em up launched as an Xbox timed exclusive on Xbox One and the Windows Store late 2016. 
The Steam release, which costs Â£39.99, includes the X-Fists Exo Suit Weapon. The specs are below: 
Dead Rising 4 minimum system requirements: CPU: Intel i5-2400 / AMD FX 6300 RAM: 6GB GPU: GTX 760 (2 GB) / HD 7850 (2 GB) DX: DirectX 11
